name: Take A Hike...Please
description:
You work at a nature center called Scenic Route, and the only thing keeping you away from telling a patron to ,"Take a Hike!" is a deep breath.

My submission for the Vaultacular Jam!

Theme: Here, Take One

Goal: Get through your work day!

Keep your Temper Meter (Red) full! Mind the Chaos Meter (Orange), if things get too chaotic, your temper goes down quicker.

Ways to keep cool:

1. Deep Breath: (R1 or A) to summon your meter (R2 or Shift) to take a breath.

2.Stare out the window: (X or D)

Tip: Skrimps is your friend.

Controls:

Controller/ PC

A/ Space : Interact

B / W: Items

X / D:  Look out the window

R1 / A : Breath

R2 / Shift: Summon Breathing Meter
